CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: kinetic energy
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special ionized electricity from the power core gets turned into a hard energy amalgam in the gun breech, the amalgam doesn't burn like normal energy projectiles, instead it deals blunt damage, hence the name kinetic energy.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: carbon crystal
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The carbon crystal core shatters into sharp splinter that maximize flesh damage but produces less armor penetration.
